Text:
I didn't really know what to expect with this film, and was totally surprised as romances are not usually "my thing".

Set against the backdrop of 911 and Afghanistan, there's lots of action as well, and I predict that this movie will win a whole bunch of awards. I would rate it 9/10 - Superb (and totally unexpected), and with great music throughout. 

A must see for him & her alike!  :)
